articles.author: Amit Kamath
articles.title: Germany once ruled world javelin. Now, as Neeraj Chopra soars, they plot a return to the top - The Indian Express
articles.description: While three Indians finished in the top-6 at the World Athletics Championships, just one German javelin thrower, Julian Weber, was in Budapest. The Indian Express talks to the three men who led the European country’s dominance – Olympic champion Thomas Rohler…
articles.content: Not too long ago, the talk in track and field circles was about a golden generation of javelin throwers emerging from Germany, all of them having breached the hallowed 90m mark, a distance considered… [+9517 chars]

articles.author: Ted Bosworth
articles.title: ESC Issues First Comprehensive Cardiomyopathy Guidelines - Medscape
articles.description: The European Society of Cardiology has released the first major set of international guidelines to address cardiomyopathies beyond hypertrophic forms.
articles.content: The European Society of Cardiology has released new guidelines for cardiomyopathies, their first major comprehensive international guidelines to address diagnosis and treatment of the broad causes of… [+5541 chars]

articles.title: European pricing for Google Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro surfaces online before October launch - Notebookcheck.net
